resend.title: Resend Verification Code
resend.alert: Resending code can be used if the previous code is not valid within 24 hours.
resend.success: A new verification code has been sent to your e-mail address. Please check your e-mail address.

activate.title: Activate Account
activate.success: Your account has been successfully verified. Please log in.
